column4: I have a VERY weird problem, a few minutes ago I could browse one of my favo sites (binsearch.info) now it won't even load, hell I can't even ping it, but it works for evryone else, how is that possible?
Does not sound weird, sounds like the machine you are trying to reach went down
or rather, your route to it
but it works for evryone else
As I'm not sitting in your lap, my route is not your route
hmm I see, I  don't understand what your saying though, yeah other sites works
maybe i should just wait then :S ?
like I said I can't even ping it, but it works for evryone else

Imagine internet connected by a network of thin lines. My set of lines is different from yours as I am elsewhere. There might be a line missing in yours, a dead end. (Was that more clear?) But do a traceroute se see it better
lynoure, so what you're saying is , my connection/pipe to binsearch is down etc? ok doing route now
Of courge they might have just started hating you and blocked your incoming from their firewall but I'd put my money on a temporary network problem not specifically related to your computer
lynoure, how do I trace route?
heh :P yeah, how do I trace route?
first you need to install traceroute...
after that it can be just    traceroute hostename
